When it comes to brand stories, you’d be hard-pressed to find a more intriguing one than Captain Fawcett’s which turns its line of shaving products into an elaborate adventure.

The fictitious Captain Peabody Fawcett has laid the groundwork for the company to craft various product lines that lend themselves to a more classic era of men’s grooming.

Over the past couple of decades, Captain Fawcett has gone on to release a large variety of mustache wax, beard oil, beard balm, shaving creams and alum bars.

Looking for the best products to pair up with Captain Fawcett’s lines? Products that are often paired with the brand include: Dapper Dan pomade, Vie-Long Cachurro Professional Horse Hair Shaving Brush, Razorpit Razor Blade Sharpener and Kent Beard Comb.

We here to help: love the exciting back story and rich imagery behind the Captain Fawcett’s brand...but not quite sure how to present it to your customers? Don’t worry. Our skilled staff members love training our clients’ staff on the best ways to market the wholesale shaving supplies we carry. Just ask.

About Perma Brands: we are North America’s leading distributor of premium wholesale shaving supplies and offer retailers (our most common customers are men’s clothing stores, tobacconists and barbershops) the widest variety of Captain Fawcett’s razor handles, shave cream, mustache wax and wholesale double edge razors.

Please note - Perma Brands only sells wholesale shaving products to qualified retailers.
